body: Thanks for the reply, Chris. I've been able to get back into the model and try out some IDF editing. However, it seems that there are some errors in re-running the IDF within grasshopper. See below for the error message I get from the HB component as well as my ZoneVentilation:DesignFlowRate parameters I used to set the nightflush using the deltaT approach.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KKxcsif2Kp13Vo-2-hXj9cbU92HCfRGRP2DhLADtQmTKj999GEXRkdpBxYZQPk1FQ7WgoJX7sT6rakHNCy*GeXgzC0oS6Hd9/rerunIDF_error.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KKxcsif2Kp16ByTwNoEBVV4Lw4sd-eZM5xw5gecKxpohlV778a1TJkUUq*pUXqLylA9c5oDhvC4dMaAkDG--pWCX4rFiguIq/IDFparameters.PNG)
